title: Stronk Villager Golems

Have you ever thought to yourself: ?Wow, iron golems are so cool! If only they more closely resembled a villager, that would be even better!? Think no more, because now this is 100% possible with my brand new resourcepack!
(This has definitely totally never been done before!)

title: ? Star Wars Kylo Ren Pack ?
briefDescription: I actually made this pack for personal usage but a few people seemed to be interested in it, So i decided to upload it on ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
I actually made this pack for personal usage but a few people seemed to be interested in it, So i decided to upload it on MCPEDL. This Resource pack will feature some tweaks inspired by Kylo Ren from Star Wars,
? Diamond Armor as Kylo Ren?s Armour,
? Elytra as an Cloak, (black)
? Diamond Sword as Kylo Ren?s Crossguard Lightsaber,

? Trident as Double-bladed Lightsaber,
? Bow as Blaster rifle, (that shoots lasers!) + indicator
? Diamond Sword as Kylo Ren?s Crossguard Lightsaber,
? Full Moon as Death Star,

? Some flipbook kind of thing?
to do it equip: Wooden Sword, -> Golden Sword, -> Diamond Sword,
? And Custom paintings,

title: The Great Pillager War
briefDescription: After countless defeats, the Illagers have updated their strategy. A new way to wage war has come.The future of warfare, for all to be ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
After countless defeats, the Illagers have updated their strategy. A new way to wage war has come.
The future of warfare, for all to be seen, is here.
THE GREAT PILLAGER WAR
This texture pack is all about the Illagers (and Iron Golems, but we?ll get to that). It gives all of them, with the exception of the Ravager, the appearance of the Central Powers during World War I, while the Iron Golem has a more modern, tank-like appearance.
The Great Pillager War
Belligerents:
Illager Forces:
Standard pillagers have traded in their leather armor and crossbows for steel helmets and bolt-action rifles.
Vindicators have gained a new look, with a steel chestplate and armored goggles similar to those used by early tank crews.
Evokers don a ceremonial Pickelhaube (or at least my best attempt at one), in order to stand out from the lowly troops.
Witches wear a similar helmet to Evokers, as well as a gas mask to protect themselves from their poison attacks.

Villager Alliance:
The villagers have been improving their arsenal as well. Born in factories, delivered by engineers, immune to the bullets of the regular soldier, unbothered by the burdens of the land: The Iron Golem Mark II. Inspired by British tanks and experimental armored suits from the first world war, the venerable Iron Golem has received an upgrade in the form of extra armor plates and identification markings on the shoulders in order to tell different units apart when fighting against the Illagers.

Hello, I am RoboCreep11 and I have decided to retexture all ores in the overworld to look like gems. This is resource pack is based off of the gems in the Sonic games.
This is a small pack, but it is here for anyone who would like to use it. If you are a YouTuber and want to do a video on it, please contact me at ( [email protected] ). I have created a list here of all 7 ores that I retextured.
? Coal
? Iron
? Gold
? Lapis
? Diamond
? Redstone
? Emerald

crawledImageUrls.text:
This resourcepack was originally for one of my survival worlds, but I decided to put it on here for others to use. The main purpose of this resource pack is to just have fun, because it adds something new into Minecraft.
I have scrapped all of the diamond textures, and I completely remade them. I have created a list of the things I have retextured.

? Diamond Chestplate
? Diamond Leggings
? Diamond Boots
? Diamond Sword
? Diamond Pickaxe
? Diamond Axe
? Diamond Shovel
? Diamond Hoe

Make all diamond items say ?Corrupted Diamond Etc?.

title: Totem PvP Pack ? Cobalt Blue
briefDescription: Totem is a resource pack designed for Bedrock PvPers! It is specially tailored to minigames such as SkyWars, Bedwars, CTF PvP and more. This pack ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Totem is a resource pack designed for Bedrock PvPers! It is specially tailored to minigames such as SkyWars, Bedwars, CTF PvP and more. This pack was created from the ground up with every single aspect of PvP in mind and features many changes that will put you above your competition no matter the situation.
Totem PvP Pack ? Cobalt Blue
Features
? Shorter swords and tools
? Clear glass
? More seeable doors/trapdoors
? Clear hotbar
? Bow/crossbow indicator
? Outlined ores
? Shorter fire
? Shorter plants
? And much more!!
Images

title: [1.0.0] CS_Atmos
briefDescription: CS_Atmos is a simple texture pack that makes a couple minor tweaks to the vanilla Minecraft textures that I'm sure some people out there ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
CS_Atmos is a simple texture pack that makes a couple minor tweaks to the vanilla Minecraft textures that I?m sure some people out there will appreciate having! Cheers and enjoy!
CS_Atmos is a simple texture pack that makes a couple minor tweaks to the vanilla Minecraft textures that I?m sure some people out there will appreciate!
Irritated by the opaque vanilla rain and snow particles? CS_Atmos makes them transparent to look more realistic!
Think the vanilla glass borders and streaks are obnoxious? CS_Atmos makes glass blocks 100% transparent and borderless!

title: Camouflage Doors
briefDescription: This texture pack changes the textures of doors and trapdoors to blocks! Why is this useful? BECAUSE! You can troll your friends, make secret entrances, ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This texture pack changes the textures of doors and trapdoors to blocks! Why is this useful? BECAUSE! You can troll your friends, make secret entrances, make cool decorations and patterns, and other tactical uses! Who cares about acacia doors, bookshelf doors are better!

title: Not Java Edition Subtitle
briefDescription: Do you like the Java Edition logo, but also want to keep part of the bedrock logo in it? This really is meant to be ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you like the Java Edition logo, but also want to keep part of the bedrock logo in it? This really is meant to be a joke pack, but use it however you?d like! Mainly, this was meant to be something to test out in Photoshop, but I went ahead and made it into a pack anyways.

(Java 1.14 Panorama: https://mcpedl.com/java-1-14-panorama/)
Although this is a small change, it actually references PhoenixSC?s own ?Not [Microsoft] Edition,? but instead replaces ?Microsoft? with ?Java.?
Little bit of a joke, but kind of a nice addon to a set.
Even before the pack was made, I managed to make a photoshopped version of what the pack should have looked like.

title: Flowering Season
briefDescription: Do you want to experience the flowering season in Minecraft? Do you like to see these beautiful colors around you? If you are, let me ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you want to experience the flowering season in Minecraft? Do you like to see these beautiful colors around you? If you are, let me introduce you the Flowering Season Texture Pack.
This pack will change the way you look at Minecrat by changing the color of many textures in the game into a purple and pinkcolor. Also this pack will add many new textures to the game and replace other.
So enjoy it!

As you can see in the picture, the grass block, tallgrass, leaves, sky and water color will become purple and pink. Also there are a new water plant (replaces the waterlily) and a new flower (replaces the allium flower).
Here are all the blocks :-
*Note :- You can bring the wheel using the paintings, and you can bring the water plant using the waterlily.

title: Autumn Birch
briefDescription: Autumn Birch is a simple texture pack intended to increase the vibrancy of Minecraft. By altering the color of birch leaves, the pack adds variety ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Autumn Birch is a simple texture pack intended to increase the vibrancy of Minecraft. By altering the color of birch leaves, the pack adds variety to each forest biome in your world.

The pack only changes the texture of carried birch leaves, birch sapling and birch colormap. This allows the pack to be compatible with other texture packs (including Faithful). The color map is designed so that the birch leaves will remain their default green color in colder biomes, however in forests and birch forests they will appear a rich, orange color.
